title: Big Fan of the Taylor Family
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Mia-chan, your family is amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Riko, you’ve heard of them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Of course. I listen to their music a lot and play your older sister’s songs on the piano.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m not surprised. My mom, dad, and older sister are super talented!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Mia-chan, you’re as skilled as they are, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>As a composer, well, yeah, I guess so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re an amazing composer and school idol! I’m just a big fan of the Taylor family.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh? R-Really? Seriously?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, Mia-chan, you can get embarrassed? You’re so cute𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Stop treating me like a child! Riko, I’m your senior, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
